thread.title: Hotel Deal of the Week: The Croke Park Hotel
thread.title_full: Travel | Hotel Deal of the Week: The Croke Park Hotel - entertainment.ie

author: entertainment.ie
title: Hotel Deal of the Week: The Croke Park Hotel
text:
DUBLIN ZOO PACKAGE : €199 in total - 1 night Bed & Breakfast with a three-course meal and a family pass for 2 adults and 2 kids, under 12, to Dublin Zoo. Rate includes complimentary car parking. This is a midweek and weekend offer, valid September 1 to December 31, 2015.
www.doylecollection.com/Croke_Park ‎
